name: Import Shopify To WP
author: WPBeginner

sections.description:
Easily transfer your Shopify Store to WooCommerce by using a tool that is 100% free.

How to use it:

  1. Go to shopifytowp.com.
  2. On this website you’ll find a form where you must enter your Shopify store URL and a valid email.
  3. After submitting the form, you’ll be asked to install our Shopify App into your store.
  4. Once the application is installed, you can submit a request to export the products, orders and customers.
  5. An email, containing the download URL, will be sent to you when it’s done. Follow it to get the store data in a ZIP archive.
  6. Go to WordPress dashboard -> Tools -> Shopify Importer.
  7. Select the Zip archive in the upload field and press “Upload”. Once the upload is done, you’ll be redirected to the next step where you can see the products list.
  8. Press “Start Import” and wait for the process to finish.
  9. Done.

Credits

Import Shopify To WP is created by the WPBeginner team.

What’s Next?

To learn more about WordPress, you can visit WPBeginner for tutorials on topics like:

  • WordPress Speed and Performance

…and many more WordPress tutorials.

  • MonsterInsights – See the Stats that Matter and Grow Your Business with Confidence. Best Google Analytics Plugin for WordPress.
  • SeedProd – Create beautiful landing pages with our powerful drag & drop landing page builder.
  • WP Mail SMTP – Improve email deliverability for your contact form with the most popular SMTP plugin for WordPress.
  • RafflePress – Best WordPress giveaway and contest plugin to grow traffic and social followers.
  • Smash Balloon – #1 social feeds plugin for WordPress – display social media content in WordPress without code.
  • AIOSEO – the original WordPress SEO plugin to help you rank higher in search results (trusted by over 2 million sites).
  • PushEngage – Connect with visitors after they leave your website with the leading web push notification plugin.
  • TrustPulse – Add real-time social proof notifications to boost your store conversions by up to 15%.

Visit WPBeginner to learn from our WordPress Tutorials and find out about other best WordPress plugins.
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for ‘Import Shopify To WP’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select shopifytowp-importer.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download shopifytowp-importer.zip
  2. Extract the shopifytowp-importer directory to your computer
  3. Upload the shopifytowp-importer directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin’s dashboard
sections.faq:
What data is imported?

You can import:
* All Products
* All Customers
* All Orders

Is the relation between products, orders and customers imported as well?

Yes.

Does it import images in the media library

Yes.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Bug fix: The variations are not assigned to the main product if the variation/attribution title contains non-english characters.

1.0.0

  • Initial version
